definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前镀锌厂将被删除，将在其位置上兴建的六辊轧机。

sentences.english: The article describes the structural features and configuration of the edger stand with whole hydraulic screw-down for HCM Rough mills.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍全液压压下立辊轧机的结构特点及组成。

sentences.english: The development of slab width gauge in 3 h rolling mill is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍三辊轧机板坯测宽仪的研制过程。

sentences.english: This paper presents the loop control system for high speed wire rod mill at Tangshan Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍唐钢高速线材轧机的活套控制系统。
行星溶解，捏合机，三辊轧机。

sentences.english: The biting ability of compact mill and the restricted condition of forced biting were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了紧凑式轧机咬入能力和强迫咬入的限制条件。

sentences.english: The shell not-rotation is the important technical requirement for planetary cross-mill.
sentences.chinese: 轧件不转是行星斜轧机轧制的重要工艺要求。

sentences.english: A robust repetitive controller for roll eccentricity compensation of cold mill is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了用于冷轧机的轧辊偏心补偿的鲁棒重复控制器。

sentences.english: Jigang will fix this problem during the recent shut down of the finishing mill.
sentences.chinese: 济钢会在最近的精轧机停产时解决这一问题。

sentences.english: The rolling strategy is the base for presetting the process control parameters of cold tandem mill.
sentences.chinese: 轧制策略是冷连轧机进行过程控制参数设定的基础。

sentences.english: One kind of speed synchronization control method for deflector roll of cold rolling mill is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种冷轧机偏导辊的速度同步控制方式。

sentences.english: The article gives the key elements to select four-row cylindrical roller bearings for plate mill application.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍轧机用四列圆柱滚子轴承的选用要点。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the characteristics of hydraulic loop system of rolling mill.
sentences.chinese: 本文对轧机液压活套系统的工作特性进行了分析。

sentences.english: FQMTM is the core of Danieli seamless pipe production process.
sentences.chinese: FQMTM轧机是达涅利无缝钢管生产的核心设备。

sentences.english: The article describes the design and calculation of air-cushion piler at the rear end of the cross-cut shear in cold rolling mills.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍冷轧机横切机组尾部气垫垛板的设计计算。

sentences.english: The rolling mill is the complex mechano-electronic system controlled by computer.
sentences.chinese: 轧机是计算机控制的复杂机电系统。

definition: to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
